meanings.definition: A substance used to remove or mask unpleasant odors.
meanings.sent1: I bought some deodorizers for the house to make it smell better.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various deodorizers to freshen up rooms.
meanings.sent3: The deodorizers worked like magic, making the room smell like a field of flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a deodorizer, dispelling the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The deodorizers filled the air with a clean, refreshing scent.

meanings.definition: Devices or products that eliminate or reduce bad smells.
meanings.sent1: The deodorizers plugged into the wall helped get rid of the pet odor.
meanings.sent2: Many people use deodorizers in their cars to keep them smelling nice.
meanings.sent3: The deodorizers in the bathroom were like little helpers fighting against stinky smells.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a deodorizer, making the whole room feel brighter.
meanings.sent5: The deodorizers in the gym locker room kept the air fresh and clean.

meanings.definition: Chemicals that neutralize or cover up foul scents.
meanings.sent1: The deodorizers in the spray bottle masked the smell of the garbage.
meanings.sent2: Some deodorizers contain strong chemicals to combat tough odors.
meanings.sent3: The deodorizers in the lab were like secret agents fighting against bad smells.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a deodorizer, making everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: The deodorizers in the restroom quickly eliminated any unpleasant odors.
